title: Did Riot Screwup with 'Your Shop'? Or are these picks intentional?

embed.description: All of my friends got frosted ezreal and pickpocket twitch... None of us even play those people... Can hardly call it ' **my** shop'

body: Seems a bit strange that a large portion of my friends got Frosted Ezreal and Pickpocket Twitch, and everyone replying to this reddit comment, and they all have something in common: We don't play twitch or ezreal nearly at all. This doesn't feel like "My" shop at all, feels like a random pull from a skin pool that they chose to put up on sale, not really motivating to buy anything for stuff I never play.

replies.body:
Can I still get my 'old' your shop back? 
When i looked at it before it got removed I got a legacy skin I really want to have and was happy with the other content which I wanted to purchase today.
But now I can't anymore since it's been taken down already, Im really upset and I'm hoping I can still get those skins back.
As long as you did reveal the offers the first time around, we can still see those on the backend. Just hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

It looks like there were some issues with the personal shop this time around. I'm not entirely sure what the main problem was, but it sounds like it might have been related to Blitz and Twitch popping up for almost everyone. [**It was taken down a bit ago, and when it comes back the offers should refresh.**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/REhwqdew-your-shop-is-open?comment=005a)
If people purchased twitch/blitz already, will they get new choices ("bonus shop!")? This isn't relevant to me, but I think it's safe to and it happened to somebody out there.
As far as I know, you should get to keep any skins you bought and you'll still get a new set. I'll have to confirm, this though!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IMP8JM4h,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-19T00:21:42.045+0000)
>
> As far as I know, you should get to keep any skins you bought and you'll still get a new set. I'll have to confirm, this though!

I got Underworld TF in my shop, I main TF and really wanted that skin, I went to get RP and when I came back the shop was disabled, can I still have my Underworld TF? If not I'm goanna be pretty mad.

Absolutely! We still have records of what you were given at first, so if you really wanted that Underworld Twisted Fate skin you can hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to make that happen!
what if you already bought 1-2 skins from the shop?
No worries about that. You're welcome to keep those since, well, we offered them to you xD! We won't be reversing any purchases from that personal shop.

Galio and Karma were the only ones i bought because i somewhat play them

i got Jhin and Cho'Gath skin but i don't even play either

According to a rioter in the reddit thread, any purchases from your first shop will stay, if they don't you can contact support and they will still give you the deal, they will honor any deals from the first shop if you want them.
